required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparative Study Between Patellar Denervation and Non-patellar Denervation in Total Knee Arthroplasty With Patellar Resurfacing
clinical_study.official_title: Patellar Denervation in Total Knee Arthroplasty With Patellar Resurfacing to Relieve Postoperative Anterior Knee Pain: a Randomized Control Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the post-operative anterior knee pain (AKP) between patellar denervation and non-patellar denervation in total knee arthroplasty with patellar resurfacing

primary_outcome.measure: Change of post-operative anterior knee pain
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline Visual Analog Scale for anterior knee pain at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Visual Analog Scale for anterior knee pain (minimum 0, maximum 10) Do higher values represent a worse outcome

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline range of motion of knee at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: degree of motion of the knee after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Knee Society and Knee Society function score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline Knee Society and Knee Society function score at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Knee Society and Knee Society function score (minimum 0, maximum 200)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline new patellar score at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: New patellar score or Bartlett score (minimum 0, maximum 30)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline Oxford knee score 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
Change from baseline 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: The estimation of patellar position relative to the trochear

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline prevalence of anterior knee pain at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
Change from baseline activity of daily living at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: activity of daily living score (minimum 0, maximum 20)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Number and type of post-operative complication at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Number and type of post-operative complication

intervention.description: A surgical procedure in which parts of the knee joint are replaced with artificial parts (prostheses)
circumpatellar electrocautery with monopolar coagulation diathermy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Primary osteoarthritis of knee who were scheduled for a primary total knee arthroplasty
Exclusion Criteria:
- Valgus deformity
- History of inflammatory arthroplathy
- Previous fracture or open surgery on the same knee
- History of patellar instability

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Orthopaedics, Faculty of Medicine Vajira Hospital, Navamindradhiraj University
